name: Kinect drone
body:
kinect_drone
==============

1. Controlling the Parrot Ardrone 2.0 with a Kinect Motion sensor and a LeapMotion sensor.
1. Simulation done on the turtlesim package


1. ROS packages needed:
2. turtlesim
3. skeleton_markers
4. ardrone_autonomy
5. openni_camera
6. turtlesim
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
